sentences.en: A seaman went below to fetch the captain a cup of coffee.
sentences.cn: 一位水手下舱去为船长拿一杯咖啡.

sentences.en: And they roared when Seaman held up two fingers.
sentences.cn: 然后当希曼伸出两根指头的时候他们就吼叫起来.

sentences.en: Cap'n Smollett's a fine seaman, as I'll own up to any day, but stiff on discipline.
sentences.cn: 斯摩莱特船长是个出色的海员, 我一直这么说, 但他的纪律太严.

sentences.en: Could not any other seaman sail across the ocean just as he has done?
sentences.cn: 难道别的水手就不能象他那样横渡大洋 吗 ?

sentences.en: Did you have any contact with Seaman MacDonald?
sentences.cn: 你与水手麦克唐纳有什么接触 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her father had been a mer-chant seaman, absent for much of her child-hood.
sentences.cn: 她爸爸曾是商船船员，在她童年的大部分时光里都不在她身边。

sentences.en: I dreamed about this one - legged seaman for many nights afterwards.
sentences.cn: 那以后我经常梦到他说的那个一条腿的手水.

sentences.en: Please make sure that everyone takes the Seaman's Book with him.
The captain of a ship is above a seaman.
The Greek seaman went to the hospital five times.
sentences.cn: 这位希腊海员到该医院去过五次.

sentences.en: The men emigrate to work as seamen.
sentences.cn: 这些男人移居国外当海员。

sentences.en: The seaman deliberated. " May be for fifteen "?
sentences.cn: 水兵盘算了一下. “ 十五镑吧? ”

sentences.en: The seaman signed on for a voyage to Valparaiso and back.
sentences.cn: 那位水手签约受雇作一次来往法耳巴拉索之航行.

sentences.en: The Seaman was a bar for pool players and hard drinkers.
sentences.cn: “水手”是供台球玩家和酒徒消遣的酒吧。

sentences.en: The seaman was colted by the captain for the mistake.
sentences.cn: 为了这个过错,水手遭到船长的笞绳鞭打.

sentences.en: These last words produced a prodigious effect on the seaman.
sentences.cn: 这最后的几句话在水手们身上发生了一种奇异的效果.

words.tran_cn: 熟练水手似的；海员般的

phrases.tran_cn: 一级水手；熟练水手；[英国，加拿大]二等水兵

trans.tran_en: a  sailor  on a ship or in the navy who is not an officer
